author: mszefler
msg: Major cleanup of Minerva DB pool.
Removed prepared statement pooling as it is redundant with modern JDBC drivers.
Fix NPE when pool runs out of connections in pool (throw resource exception instead).
Added checks to prevent concurrent state modifications.

author: niallp
msg: Fix for VALIDATOR-226 - Null-Stream input to ValidatorResources leads to MalformedURLExceptions - thanks to Lian Ort

author: jukka
msg: JCR-750: Applied the patch from Alexander Klimetschek. Thanks!
